org.shared.net

Interface ConnectionHandler<C extends Connection>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the Connection type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FilteredHandler<H,C,T>, OobHandler<C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFilteredHandler, ClientServerTest.Utf8Handler, SynchronousHandler, TestXmlHandler, XmlHandler

    public interface ConnectionHandler<C extends Connection>
    Defines a handler for Connection callbacks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConnectionHandler.ClosingType
      An enumeration of the ways in which a connection may be closed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      C getConnection()
      Gets the Connection associated with this handler.
      void onBind()
      On binding.
      void onClose()
      On completion of closure.
      void onClosing(ConnectionHandler.ClosingType type, ByteBuffer bb)
      On closure.
      void onReceive(ByteBuffer bb)
      On receipt of data.
      void setConnection(C conn)
      Sets the Connection associated with this handler.
      String toString()
      Creates a human-readable representation of this handler.

    • Method Detail

      • onBind

        void onBind()
        On binding.

      • onReceive

        void onReceive(ByteBuffer bb)
        On receipt of data.
        Parameters:
        bb - the ByteBuffer containing data.

      • onClosing

        void onClosing(ConnectionHandler.ClosingType type,
             ByteBuffer bb)
        On closure.
        Parameters:
        type - the ConnectionHandler.ClosingType.
        bb - the ByteBuffer containing data. It must be completely drained, as this is the final callback.
        See Also:
        ConnectionHandler.ClosingType

      • onClose

        void onClose()
        On completion of closure.

      • getConnection

        C getConnection()
        Gets the Connection associated with this handler.

      • setConnection

        void setConnection(C conn)
        Sets the Connection associated with this handler.
        Parameters:
        conn - the Connection.

      • toString

        String toString()
        Creates a human-readable representation of this handler.
        Overrides:
